hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Huraira:that he passed by a group of people in front of whom there was a roasted sheep. They invited him but he refused to eat and said, "Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) left this world without satisfying his hunger even with barley bread

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا كَانَ النَّبِيُّ صلى الله عليه وسلم وَأَصْحَابُهُ يَأْكُلُونَ
chapter.eng-name: What the Prophet (ﷺ) and his Companions used to eat.
